directions.step:
Wash, cut in half length-wise and remove seeds from squash. Place in shallow pan, cut side down. Bake at 325Â° till almost tender (45 to 50 min.) Turn cut side up and sprinkle with salt. Continue baking until tender (15 to 20 more minutes.) Heat onions according to package directions. Spoon into squash centers. Sprinkle with paprika.
Serves 6 to 8
Source: Recipes Out of This World Women of St. Agnes Catholic Church Charleston, WV 1969
